original_title: 10-hour Water Cut on Saturday (29) for Ethul Kotte, Rajagiriya and surrounding areas
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A ten-hour water cut will be imposed for several areas on Saturday (29) from 11 AM to 9 PM.
The Regional Conference of the Charted Accountants of Sri Lanka was held on Thurday (27) in Jaffna.
Dispose expired tear gas from all police stations, says COPA; Police assures expired goods will never be used
